comments.body: I assume this will eventually move to something run in k8s.io/kubectl?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +66,70 @@
# These are files for runtime code
BINDATA_OUTPUT="staging/src/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/generated/bindata.go"
# IMPORTANT: if you make any changes to these arguments, you must also update
# pkg/generated/BUILD and/or build/bindata.bzl.

comments.body: don't we need to expose the source files (listed only here in this shell script, things like `examples/...`, `test/e2e/testing-manifests/`, `translations/...`, etc) to make somehow? or do we just always run this?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@source "${KUBE_ROOT}/hack/lib/logging.sh"

if [[ ! -d "${KUBE_ROOT}/examples" ]]; then
	echo "${KUBE_ROOT}/examples not detected.  This script should be run from a location where the source dirs are available."
	exit 1
